bioimg.base.show_bbox¶

bioimg.base.show_bbox(img, bbox, color='white', lw=2, size=12)¶
Parameters
imgarray

Intensity or RGB image

bbox: list / array of tuples

Each tuple represents the bounding box image coordinates (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)

colorstring

Color of the bounding boxes

lwfloat

Linewidth of the bounding boxes

sizeint

Figure size
